name: bran
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the outer covering of grain that is separated when making white flour. Bran is added to other foods because it contains a lot of the fibre needed for a healthy body: wheat/oat bran Both these breakfast cereals have added bran.

the outer covering of grain that is separated when making white flour and is valued as a food for its fiber: We had bran muffins for breakfast.
